Posts.Title: Once you're Stage IV are you always Stage IV? VonHilda exbrnxgrl

Posts.Content: VonHilda wrote: I had ER+/PR+/HER2- Grade 1 breast cancer with 2/15 lymph nodes positive back in 2000. Last month I discovered it had come back to my lymph nodes in my neck and in my hip bone, and I'm now on Letrozole & Ibrance. I saw on paper that I'm now Stage IV, so my question is 'does treatment take me back to an earlier stage or remove me from being a Stage at all, or are you forever fighting it? Am I now always Stage IV? I'm keen to hear from people who were Stage IV and have changed status. Dx 7/4/2017, IDC, Left, 2cm, Stage IV, metastasized to bone, Grade 1, 2/15 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Targeted Therapy 8/8/2017 Ibrance (palbociclib) Hormonal Therapy 8/8/2017 Femara (letrozole) Log in to post a reply
